originalText.text:
Today was my first time bringing my morkie to this establishment and I am
beyond happy how Jenna cut my doggie he looks so handsome. Jenna asked questions and made sure I was satisfied with his haircut. I will be returning.

beyond happy how Jenna cut my doggie he looks so handsome. Jenna asked questions and made sure I was satisfied with his haircut. I will be returning.

originalText.text: Precious Paws and Bubbles always makes my dog Max look amazing. Seriously he loves going there and comes back looking so adorable! They care about your dog and truly want your experience to be seamless. Don’t think twice, book them!

text.text: Precious Paws and Bubbles always makes my dog Max look amazing. Seriously he loves going there and comes back looking so adorable! They care about your dog and truly want your experience to be seamless. Don’t think twice, book them!

originalText.text:
If your pet means the world to you, this needs to be your groomer!

Today, I treated my dog to their ‘Deluxe Package,’ and I couldn’t be happier. This comprehensive grooming option covered everything from bathing, anal gland expression, nail trimming, ear cleaning, teeth care, to a meticulous hair cut and stylish blow dry.

Although my dog was a tad nervous going in, by the time I picked her up she was cheerful and calm. I believe this speaks volumes about how well they care for the pets.

Their pricing is refreshingly reasonable compared to others in the area, and what sets them apart is their unwavering focus on ensuring the comfort and happiness of the pets throughout the entire service.

I genuinely appreciated the upfront communication about their commitment to taking their time, rather than rushing the service. Their dedication to ensuring the dog’s comfort is evident. I much prefer this approach over rushing through services, potentially making the dog uncomfortable in the name of speed.

Precious Paws & Bubbles Grooming is definitely now my go-to spot for my dog’s grooming!

originalText.text: Tyshema is so wonderful! My pup came out looking and smelling so good! She was so caring it was his first hair cut. Thank you!

text.text: Tyshema is so wonderful! My pup came out looking and smelling so good! She was so caring it was his first hair cut. Thank you!

originalText.text: In addition to bringing my Yorkie, Peppa, to Precious Paws & Bubbles, for grooming, I have also boarded with them on numerous occasions.  The owner, Tyshema is friendly and you can readily feel that she is a lover of animals.  My husband who is quite protective of Peppa, does not trust anyone else outside of family to groom or board Peppa.  Precious Paws is conveniently located (only a couple of blocks from the subway).  Most places that I have been to in the past, take Peppa behind closed doors as if they are getting ready to perform surgery.  Not with Precious Paws.  On my first visit to the establishment, Tyshema took me on a tour of where the actual grooming takes place.  I was immediately sold.  It was clean, and you get an idea of what goes on when your animal is being groomed.  She listens to you when you tell her what you want, and keeps a record going forward.  When you come to Precious Paws, I promise you—you will become a repeat customer!
